mapper.update: update f_user set u_nick=#{u_nick}, u_tel=#{u_tel}, u_email=#{u_email}, u_wallet=#{u_wallet} where u_idx=21
mapper.select: select u_pwd from f_user where u_idx=21
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from f_client order by c_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select * from f_account order by a_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
select a_balance from (select a_balance,u_idx from (select a_idx,u_idx,a_balance from f_account order by a_idx desc) where rownum=1) where u_idx=21
